translation.Message_0_Page_0: I'm sorry, but we don't recruit <color=uncommon>Ensigns</color> sight unseen. If we notice you helping out around here there's a place for you in our ranks, however!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Come to think of it we're looking for someone to help spread word of our presence here <pause>- if you're interested to give a hand talk with my first mate Laurence.
